transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello
Hanji
Hi sir very good morning silver se meri baat ho rahi hai

Customer: Ji bataiye

Executive: Ji sir sir India Mart se baat karti hu mai aapka na aapne aapke pass abhi call wall gaya tha aapke account manager ke side se aur aapne usme not satisfied feedback submit kiya tha

Customer: Ji

Executive: Right ha to main na usse not satisfied aapne matlab as an account manager ko diya hai ya services se related kya issue aa raha hai sir

Customer: Mam meri already baat ho chuki hai main na repeat nahi karna chahta hu mere ko discontinue karna hai is service ko business nahi mil raha hai

Executive: Unhone bataya unhone bataya aapko ki aapne service vagerah use karne se bhi mana kar diya hai

Customer: Ji

Executive: Right okay business nahi aa raha hai matlab abhi tak koi bhi deal vagerah aapka close nahi hua hai is reason se aap

Customer: Nahi

Executive: Okay
April April se hi
Alright sir sir like dekhiye mujhe unhone aapse jo baat kari thi unhone use karne ke liye bas aapko isliye bola tha kyunki jitna main aapke portal pe dekh pa rahi hu sir ki services na starting se hi use nahi hui hai in a proper manner
Is vajah se business na aane ka reason hai sir ji

Customer: Mam main to starting mein use kar raha tha sab relevant irrelevant sab mark kar raha tha uske baad bhi vahi cheez repeat to mera itna time waste bhi ho raha hai isme

Executive: I'll I'll tell you one thing dekhiye aap ek din aake aapne agar sari cheez ko irrelevant mark kar diya ya fir aapne sirf ek din aake leads consume kari usse aapka parameter nahi banta hai

Customer: [unintelligible]

Executive: Just a minute sir just a minute

(silence)

Executive: The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold please stay on the line aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain usne aapki call ko hold

(silence)

Executive: Hello hanji
Ji kya hai na ki do one thing is possible main aapke sath ek bar video meeting pe connect kar sakti hu main aapko jo cheeze bata rahi hu main aapko samne video meeting pe apni screen share karke na ye sari cheeze dikha dungi ki aapke account manager aapko leads consume karne ke liye kyun bolta hai uska kya effect padta hai aapke jo online portal hai vaha pe business chal raha hai usse

Customer: Mam wo to mujhe pata hai lead management kaise usko consume karna hai nahi karna I know that but the thing is ki starting mein I was active in this uske baad mere ko koi sense nahi laga ki isko kya karna hai kyunki main to us time pe lead aap dekh sakte ho meri history bhi aapko dikhegi ki main contact bhi kar raha hu customer se ek to bogus inquiries itni aa rahi hai upar se jo mera product hai wo usme match nahi ho raha hai to I don't think so it's relevant it's mera time waste hai isme

Executive: Okay
I'll tell you one thing aapka ek ye product hai Atlas Copco air compressor right

Customer: Ji

Executive: Sir is product mein till date abhi tak jabse aapki services start hui hai tabse leke abhi tak 2300 leads generate ho chuki hai theek hai sirf buyleads I'm not talking about inquiry and calls theek hai main sirf aapko ye buyleads generation bata rahi hu in fact November ke month mein bhi abhi tak 45 leads is product mein aapki generate ho chuki hai theek hai main sirf

Customer: Wo to theek hai aapke system mein dikha raha hai na but the thing is ki wo mere territory mein hai ki nahi hai wo bhi to mere ko dekhna padega na aap all over India ka bata rahe ho ki main aapko West Bengal ka bata raha hu

Executive: Ji

Customer: Ye sab to baat ho chuki hai mam ye na kya bar bar ye baat karne se kuch solve hone wala hai hai nahi kyunki main 10 bar baat kar chuka hu India Mart se

Executive: Okay

Customer: And ab ab kya hai na aap mera aap baat karke bhi koi solution nahi niklega I am sure about that

Executive: Okay sir dekhiye mujhe na ek cheez aapka jo product hai na ye Atlas Copco vagerah ke regarding isme aapke pass inquiries aati hai calls aate hain lekin aapke end se koi replies koi call backs nahi diye gaye sir why aapko
In fact aapka catalog jo calls aate hain usme to maine reply kiya hi hai aur jo leads aati hai wo to maine aapko already bata diya hai ki pehle main active tha jab mujhe laga ki nahi isme to kuch kam ban nahi raha hai time waste hai to uske baad fir maine band kar diya isko use karna

Executive: Sir dekhiye jo hai na aapka aapka jo product hai na sir uska strong point ye hai ki wo samne se calls inquiries se aapka product bikega theek hai abhi wo samne se inquiries calls ke liye aapko at least service use karni padegi sir this is the only thing
I'll do one thing I'll ask your account manager theek hai ki wo aapko aapke product ke regarding sirf West Bengal se aapko requirement hai na

Customer: Ji

Executive: Thoda near by bhi nahi cover kar sakte hain sir

Customer: Nahi sirf West Bengal ka hi hamara jo territory hai na mam wo West Bengal ka hi diya hua hai

Executive: Accha okay to aap West Bengal mein bataiye abhi November month mein kitne leads aaye hain us product ke

Executive: I'll tell you ha accha ek cheez mujhe bataiye refrigerator air dryer mein deal karte hain aap hai na

Customer: Hanji

Executive: Theek hai mere pass November month mein sirf aap wo chodiye na aap sirf mere ko aap mere ko sirf Atlas Copco screw compressor ka mere ko aap bataiye

Customer: [unintelligible]

Executive: Khali ek hi product ka aap bataiye na baki sare hata dijiye aap

Executive: Surely one minute

(silence)

Executive: Aur isme sold out agar main aapki buyleads dekhu to isme mere pass iski do teen buyleads hai aapke Atlas wale ki aur along with that aapke refrigerator air dryer vagerah ki leads hai mere pass aap sirf West Bengal se all together agar main baat karu to 12 15 leads hai mere pass

Customer: Theek hai

Executive: In fact abhi bhi 38 minutes pehle aapki Hugli West Bengal se refrigerator air dryer ki buylead aayi aayi thi and within half an hour wo buylead apni sold out ho gayi means it was consumed by the five people five supplier right isliye wo apni sold out ho gayi hai

Customer: Ji

Executive: So we are getting leads sir but the issue is that hum usko consume nahi karte hain filhal accha koi aur bhi aapke aise products hain which you want to add on

Customer: Nahi mam bas yahi product hai mera

Executive: To sirf teen hi product mein aap deal karte hain ji ya aisa ho ki different size vagerah ke according products hum isme aur add kar nahi wo screw compressor jo hai usi ke andar mein bahut sare categories aate hain wo hum cater karte hain after we understand the requirement ki kya hai kya customer ka kya requirement hai

Executive: Accha accha theek hai okay so as per the requirement aap usko design karte ho product to aapne ye jo kaha hai mere ko ye jo 10 12 leads aayi hai uska screenshot bhejiye to aap mere ko whatsapp mein main aapko bata dunga kya relevant hai kya irrelevant hai

Executive: Alright okay main aapke although aap check kar sakte hain portal pe aapki past leads mein wo leads dikhti hai if you are checking from the phone to jab aap buyleads ke section pe jate ho na vaha pe thoda sa aap scroll karna aage recent relevant wale page pe theek hai vaha pe aapko past

Customer: Suniye suniye main aapko honestly batau problem kya ho rahi hai problem ye ho rahi hai na ki jo mera product hai it's a very niche product wo jo customers hai jo khoj ke aate hain ki nahi hame screw compressor hi chahiye wo mere products hai aur jo aapke jo portal mein jo products jo dikhte hain na that is below the niche products wo matlab jo chalu products hote hain na uske customers aate hain jo hum cater nahi karte hain to aapko dikhenge ki ha compressor ke to leads aa rahe hain but wo mere liye kitne relevant hai wo dekhna padega

Executive: Correct obviously I'll do one thing main jo aapke account manager hai na Prince main unko ye cheez guide kar deti hu ki kis type ke products ki requirement aapko bhejni hai area wise bhi along with that wo aapko na leads ki link share kar denge theek hai

Customer: Mam starting mein to bola bhi gaya tha ki aap leads consume karo hum whatsapp karenge aapko ek do din hua uske baad sab band ho gaya

Executive: Starting mein kab to mere ko to koi help mil nahi rahi hai

Executive: Jab aap onboard hue the I'll do one thing main group create kar deti hu theek hai main apne us group mein main bhi rahungi aur aapke account manager rahenge aap bhi rahenge vaha pe main leads aapko share karwati hu if you have facing any of the problem aap same time pe group mein revert kar but meri itni si request rahegi sir ki jo aap mere ko aap mere ko whatsapp pe leads bhejo West Bengal ke jo pehla mera product hai na Atlas Copco screw air compressor uske aap please bhejo agar meri agar wo relevant honge to I will mention there that this lead is relevant agar nahi honge to I will mention and I'll also mention the reason why is it not relevant

Executive: Surely sir vahi main aapko bol rahi hu uske hisab se aap usko tune kar sakte ho but the thing is ki ye activity already mere sath mein panch bar ho chuki hai ye aapka tuning karne ka and aur ye catalog ko sab organize karne ka ye sab ho chuka hai

Executive: Hmm hmm ye cheez main aapko ye karwa rahi hu sir jaise aapka lead consumption badhega na aapke pass us particular product ke regarding samne se calls aur inquiries aayengi sir which is more relevant theek hai calls aur inquiries jab person samne se karega to wo aapka product visit karke karega theek hai to unse aapko business milega sirf leads consume main aapko isliye karwa rahi hu

Customer: Theek hai aap aap start kariye isko dekhte hain jaisa hoga fir main baat karunga

Executive: Surely sir along with that sir abhi aapke pass feedback jayega after my call theek hai please aap us pe satisfied kar dijiyega for my resolution which I have provided you okay theek hai group mein abhi aapka create karwa deti hu along with that I'm sharing my personal number to you theek hai agar kuch bhi aapko problem hota hai aap mujhe directly us number pe connect kar sakte ho theek hai

Customer: Okay thank you

Executive: Okay thank you so much have a good day
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to discontinue the service.

- Not getting business from IndiaMART.

- Bogus inquiries and irrelevant leads.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the importance of lead consumption.

- Agreed to create a WhatsApp group for lead sharing.

- Will guide the account manager on product requirements.

- Executive shared personal number for direct contact.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will create a WhatsApp group.

- Customer will receive a feedback form.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, product, west bengal
